subject: Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The former Rangers star Mark Messier, a special assistant to General Manager Glen Sather since 2009, denied that being passed over for the coaching position played a role in his decision to leave.
snippet: The former Rangers star Mark Messier, a special assistant to General Manager Glen Sather since 2009, denied that being passed over for the coaching position played a role in his decision to leave.
